sentences.sentence: Friday 31 July 1925 henceforth became known as 'Red Friday'.
sentences.translation: 1925年7月31日这个星期五从此以后就称为“红色星期五”。

sentences.sentence: Henceforth all branches of the naval officer corps were equal to one another.
sentences.translation: 从此以后海军军官团的各个分支都相互平等。

sentences.sentence: Henceforth I will be a very different Toad.
sentences.translation: 从此以后，我将成为一个很不一样的托德。
